item.title: Beogram 4000: Installation of Hood Mounting Screw Springs
item.description:
During my quest for the ideal Beogram 4000 turntable, I’ve observed that none of the early models possess the hood mounting screw springs found on the later Beogram 4002 and 4004. These springs make removing and attaching the hood significantly easier. After consulting the service manuals, it’s clear that the Beogram 4000 was not designed with these springs. It seems B&O employed a continuous improvement approach, refining their designs over time...

item.title: Beogram 3000 (5228): Restoration of the Plexiglass Hood - Repair of a Cracked Hinge and Installation of 3D Printed Mounting Brackets
item.description:
I recently obtained a Beogram 3000 turntable with a damaged plexiglass dust cover. The plastic mounting brackets that held the cover were broken, and one of the plexiglass hinges was also broken. and one of the plexiglass hinges was broken off: To address these issues, I created a repair kit. This kit includes 3D-printed replacement mounting brackets, a specialized tool for reinstalling the spring tensioning block, and laser-cut plexiglass pieces for fixing the broken hinge...
